  • loadManifest(fileName: any, loader: any, options: any): Promise<Manifest>
    • Defined in src/runtime/runtime.ts:162

    Load and parse a manifest from a resource (not striclty a file) and return a Manifest object. The loader determines the semantics of the fileName. See the Manifest class for details.
